inclusion.criterion: Women who have undergone surgery for the correction of pelvic organ prolapse and/or urinary incontinence
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: urinary incontinence and failed a postoperative voiding trial
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recent history of more than 3 UTIs per year
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs, but no recent history of more than 3 UTIs per year. Patient is not immunocompromised.
